_comment: Cekilecek donem ID'leri. Bos liste = sadece en son donem (site varsayilani). Ornek: [139, 138, 137]. Gecerli key'leri ogrenmek icin: docker compose exec airflow-webserver python3 -c "from scrapers.financial_scraper import FinancialScraper; s = FinancialScraper(); s._navigate_to_page(); [print(f'key={p["key"]}  {p["year"]}/{p["month"]} ({p["month_str"]})') for p in s._get_available_periods()]; s.driver.quit()"
